docs.text: Mass Spectrometry Analysis of Coronavirus Data In the current global pandemic, we wanted make available mass spectrometry based analysis of SARS-CoV-2 and related coronavirus data. Metabolomics Data There are many datasets from the following publications MPLEx: a Robust and Universal Protocol for Single-Sample Integrative Proteomic, Metabolomic, and Lipidomic Analyses The raw lipidomics data as a start can be found in MassIVE: Primary human airway epithelial cells lipidome response to an icMERS coronavirus MHAE003 - MSV000083535 Primary human airway epithelial cells lipidome response to an icMERS coronavirus - MSV000083534 Primary human airway epithelial cells lipidome response to an icMERS coronavirus - MSV000083533 These data from Thomas O. Metz's Lab from PNNL are time course studies of the lipidome of the airway epitheleal tissue. Initial Metabolomics Analysis Dataset Feature Detection FBMN MSV000083535 - Positive Data Analysis Analysis MSV000083535 - Negative Data Analysis Analysis Proteomics Data Nuno Bandeira's group is working to analyze public Proteomics data related to SARS-CoV-2.
